topics.body:
"@Inky-Pinkie":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54610ee76368727a36660000#post_54610ee76368727a36660000
 Hi. Be prepared for some weird shit. 


"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5461103e6368725da1710000#post_5461103e6368725da1710000
[spoiler]three letters back? What is that? I'm not familiar with the secret messages in Gravity falls.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5461121a6368726d3b7f0200#post_5461121a6368726d3b7f0200
[spoiler]At the end of the Gravity Falls theme song, there is a voice that whispers "Three letters back" in reverse. It's a cipher that is used to crack codes found throughout the show.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5461135a63687218842e0100#post_5461135a63687218842e0100

I love how much they hide in the show though.

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5461146a636872671b210000#post_5461146a636872671b210000
There's a lot of great hidden stuff.

For example: this scene is the menu screen for Giffany's game "Romance Academy 7"
!http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140924035920/gravityfalls/images/4/4d/S2e5_romance_academy_7_title.png!
"Shizenhakka" translates to "spontaneous combustion"
